717783f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 187th Street (West)
717783f-a.text:
Broadway, at the N.W. corner of West 187th Street. Also shown is West 187th Street, north side, west from and including Broadway, to and including Bennett Ave. The view shows the Rectory and Church of St. Eliza
beth, R.C.
November 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

717786f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 187th Street (West)
717786f-a.text:
Broadway, (extreme foreground, running from right to left and visible through the trees), south from and including West 189th, to Weat 187th Streets, showing the St. Eliabeth Church (R.C.), at the N.W. corner of the latter street. Running parallel to Broadway is Bennett Ave. (center) and forming with it a right angle is West 187th Street extending west to Overlook Terrace (running parallel to Bennett Ave.). In the background are visible the rears of buildings facing on the east side of Fort Washington Ave. between West 187th and West 183rd Streets, and across them an anchorage of the George Washington Memorial Bridge. This photograph was taken from Wadsworth Terrace, between West 189th and West 190th Streets.
November 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

717782f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 187th Street
717782f-a.text:
Broadway, west side, north from, but not including, 187th Street. St. Elizabeth's (ioman Catholic) Church, which is seen in the centre,
will be demolished in 1935.
November 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
